tool_description: Through the integrated cryptocurrency API service, it is possible to create addresses, wallets, search past data, create and track transactions, and webhooks.  Developer documentation : https://docs.blocksdk.com
name: Cryptocurrency APIs
title: Cryptocurrency APIs

api_list.name: GetBlockchain
api_list.description: Symbol type : btc , bch , ltc , eth , dash , xmr
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-apis.p.rapidapi.com/v1/btc/block"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-apis.p.rapidapi.com/v1/{symbol}/block"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetBlock
api_list.description: Get the block information of that height

required_parameters.name: symbol

btc 
bch
ltc
eth
dash
xmr

api_list.name: GetAddressBalance
api_list.description: Get the remaining balance of the cryptocurrency address

url = "https://cryptocurrency-apis.p.rapidapi.com/v1/btc/address/3DYbgpBwSEWrwU56k5tHnfJ5fK9qgtPhDq/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
